products.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
products.description: A light-bodied coffee with floral and citrus notes, perfect for pour-over brewing.

products.name: Colombian Supremo
products.description: Well-balanced coffee with a smooth body and hints of chocolate and caramel.

products.name: Sumatra Mandheling
products.description: Full-bodied and earthy, this dark roast is low in acidity with a syrupy finish.

products.name: Guatemala Antigua
products.description: A smooth and rich medium roast with notes of cocoa and spice.

products.name: Kenya AA
products.description: Bright and vibrant with bold acidity and fruity overtones.

products.name: Brazil Santos
products.description: A mellow, nutty coffee with a low acidity, perfect for drip brewing.

products.name: House Blend Espresso
products.description: A bold and balanced blend perfect for espresso lovers, with a caramel crema.

products.name: Decaf Peru Organic
products.description: An organic decaf with smooth body and sweet nutty notes, processed using Swiss Water.
